Instruction: Mix together flour, water, eggs, salt, and baking powder until well combined in a bowl.

Boil a large pot of water. Transfer a portion of the dough to a spaetzle press or potato ricer. Press the dough into the boiling water, cook and stir until the pasta floats, for about 2 minutes. Use a slotted spoon to remove the pasta, rinse with water, and repeat the process with the remaining dough.
